articles.description: Nuggets star Nikola Jokic was assessed a technical foul late in the second quarter of Game 4 following a bizarre courtside incident that saw the two-time MVP make contact with Suns owner Mat Ishbia as Jokic was attempting to grab the basketball.
articles.content: PHOENIX -- Denver Nuggets star Nikola Jokic was assessed a technical foul late in the second quarter of Game 4 on Sunday night for "deliberately" making contact with Phoenix Suns owner Mat Ishbia dur… [+5348 chars]

articles.title: Man United lose again, West Ham nearly safe in Premier League - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: The Hammers took the win on Sunday via David de Gea's error, but the bigger issue is how Man United are running out of momentum when it counts.
articles.content:
LONDON -- Manchester United lost a Premier League game for the second time in four days as they were beaten 1-0 by West Ham at London Stadium.
